rajawasala ha dalada maligaye nashtawashesha girihisa pamula pihiti palath maha lekham karyalaya asabada dakiya hakiya.mema athugala pamula piwisum magata pahalin madhya kalina yugaye sita pawatha ena gal thalayehi nirmitha pokunak dakiya hakiya.athithaye di athugalata prawishta wi aththe pawwehi helana lada piyagata pela osseya.1980 dashakaye mul bhagaye di rathawahana gamanagamanayata yogyaya margayak da idikara thibe.
